column1: a ntho ee ebeekentse koloi feela
keitse keitse ha se buka yahao
u leshano ntho ena ngwana eno o teng yatswanang le ntho ee
o teng yatswanang le ntho ee
hona tjee khanthe ure likhapa otlabona le kae
a litlhare ako likhapa ake uichebela
litlhare ake ubone tsena akeubone dintho tsena
litlhare ere koloi ngwana enwa abone dikoloi tsena
litlhare uya kae jwale ngwana enwa ontseabona dintho tsena
litlhare uabona ha kere utle le buka
bona litlhare ntho ena ha etswe mona
uhana ha kere umphe yona ha usatsebe hophetla mona
bona elelekisa ntho ee moo engotseng moo
helang jwale uneure reetse jwang ka sefofane see
ntho ee ka bukeng uneure reetseng ka yona
e litlhare uephetlile ekholo ha kae
empa tsena he a man ke ena
ha se chelete ke pompo ntho ena
ha utsebe hore pompo ke bolo
usantsanere a man a man uaerata
hele hele ntho ee ke eng ee
u leshano ke a chair ntho ena
hei motho ke enwa onkile bolo
hana ke kae ka moo katse ebapalang bolo
litlhare uabona ntho ee ematha moo
litlhare chee ubatla ditonki tsena tsohle
uabona dintho ke tsee moo difofang
dinonyana tseding ke tsa moo hofofang
moshanyana enwa jwale ha ale mahlo amasweu
oo othabile jwale hobane ailobolaya mobutla
ke eo etla ho wena ha reye
a motlenyana eo he oatena he
ha ale motle tjee bonang ompeteletsa ka lebota
bona ngwana oathaba ha abona mme wahae
u leshano morara ke ona ka mona
litlhare ke enwa anka mona morara mona
hele retlo retlonka dikoloi tsane tsa rona
litlhare keakena kenka koloi yaka nna
hai wena dikoloi tsane ha disale yo
uhopola thoche eneehlaha le hodimo mola
hei thoche ena kebona ha esohlahe
ke yane fatse ke ena moo edutseng
ke ya abuti eo aefilweng ke khesa
uutlwa ntala hore ore ra satane ho nna
uskabare ha aqala acho jwalo uautlwa
ntho ena ha se tami wena
litlhare ubeujwentse le likhapa atletsebe hothola uautlwa
